p: There are 172 UBS in the DF, which reported 14.72% of the notified cases ( Table 2). According to the interviewees, many UBS were not prepared for the task of surveillance when the Family Health Strategy was implemented. The main problem reported is the lack of technological and human resources. Normally, UBS do not possess a computer or a stable internet connection, and not all the UBS have a medical doctor or enough nurses.
